title: My kids supervised email keeps asking me to sign in on my device how do i stop it its annoying
content: I want this notification to stop popping up everytime I enter youtube or my gmail "trouble signing into account" its asking me to sign into my kids account but I cant do that on my device because it has my personal email which is the lead supervisor email I tried deleting his email but I cant do that without it asking me to sign in and delete my personal emails ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
